name: Marksman (foreignguymike)
description:
Marksman

Made for the 20 second game jam. Fullscreen recommended.

You have a short window to find and eliminate the target. Target details are on the left. Make adjustments for distance and wind.

Be quick. Be precise.

Controls

LMB -- Fire

LShift / RMB -- Hold breath

R -- Restart (LMB will also restart after you fire)
